Instance.description: A multi sim rabbit hole for just two sims.

TunableList.name: first_participant_types
TunableList.description: The participant types that should map to the first sim. Note: The first participant will always map to actor, so it is not needed here.

TunableEnum.description: A participant type that should map to the first sim.

TunableList.name: second_participant_types
TunableList.description: The participant types that should map to the second sim.

TunableEnum.description: A participant type that should map to the second sim.
